Title: Lupin III: Pilot Film
Description: ['Two years after the birth of the manga a pilot film was released. It was a brief film of only 13 minutes that had the purpose of assay the response to a possible future anime realization of Lupin III. The pilot opens with a challenge call from Lupin to Zenigata from a public phone.', '\n', '\r\n(Source: AniDB) ']
Characters: ['Lupin III, Arsene', 'Jigen, Daisuke', 'Mine, Fujiko', 'Ishikawa XIII, Goemon', 'Zenigata, Kouichi', 'Akechi, Kogoro', 'Narrator']
Voices: ['Nozawa, Nachi', 'Kobayashi, Kiyoshi', 'Masuyama, Eiko', 'Kobayashi, Osamu', 'Otsuka, Chikao', 'Takagi, Hitoshi', 'Tanaka, Nobuo']
